headline: Is Archer-Daniels-Midland (ADM) Still Attractive After A 36.5% One-Year Share Price Jump
summary: Wondering whether Archer-Daniels-Midland shares still offer value after a strong run, or if most of the upside is already priced in. The stock trades at US$67.31, with a small 0.3% decline over the last week, a 17.1% gain over 30 days, 14.0% year to date, 36.5% over 1 year, 9.9% decline over 3 years, and 45.2% gain over 5 years. This gives you a mixed but interesting performance profile to weigh up. Recent moves in Archer-Daniels-Midland's share price have put more attention on how the...

headline: Assessing Whether Archer-Daniels-Midland (ADM) Looks Overvalued After Its Recent Share Price Rebound
summary: Assessing recent performance and scale Archer-Daniels-Midland (ADM) has drawn attention after a period of mixed returns, with the stock up about 14% over the past month and about 12% over the past 3 months. The company reports annual revenue of about US$83.2b and net income of roughly US$1.2b. It has reported annual revenue growth of 0.7% and net income growth of 13.2%, highlighting a large, globally diversified agribusiness footprint. See our latest analysis for Archer-Daniels-Midland.
